details.arabic_diacless: الحمد للٰه الذي كساني هٰذا (الثوب) ورزقنيه من غير حول مني ولا قوة
details.arabic: اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِيْ كَسَانِيْ هٰذَا (الثَّوْبَ) وَرَزَقَنِيْهِ مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّيْ وَلَا قُوَّةٍ
details.transliteration: Alhamdu lillaahil-la<u>th</u>ee kasaanee haa<u>th</u>aa (aththawba) wa razaqaneehi min ghayri hawlim-minnee wa laa quwwatin
details.translations: All Praise is for Allaah who has clothed me with this [garment] and provided it for me, with no power nor might from myself.
details.reference: Al-Bukhari, Muslim, Abu Dawud 4023, Ibn Majah 3285, At-Tirmithi 3458. Graded hasan By Al- Albani. See also 'Irwa'ul-Ghalil 7/47
